
snap(-20,0,20)

sky(255,255,255)
fog(206,244,255) 
ground(191,217,193)
polys(198,224,200)

fadefrom(6000)
density(4)

name(Centrifugal Rush| Under Water?)
nlaps(5)

set(47,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,180)
chk(40,0,4600,0)
set(10,0,11200,0)
set(26,0,9200,0)pr
set(10,0,16800,180)p
set(20,0,22400,180)p
set(17,0,26950,0)pt
set(15,4550,26950,90)p
set(33,5950,26950,90)
set(15,10150,26950,-90)p
set(33,11550,26950,90)
set(15,15750,26950,90)
chk(42,17550,26950,90)
set(17,20300,26950,-90)pt
set(15,20300,22400,0)p
set(15,20300,16800,0)
set(35,20300,18800,0)pr
set(15,20300,11200,0)p
fix(41,20300,14800,-1400,0)
set(20,20300,5600,180)p
set(14,20300,1050,180)pt
set(10,15750,1050,90)p
set(10,10150,1050,-90)
chk(40,10150,1050,90)
set(14,5600,1050,90)pt
set(10,5600,5600,0)p
set(28,5600,10000,0)p
set(10,5600,14400,0)p
set(10,5600,20000,180)p
set(14,5600,24550,0)pt
set(10,10150,24550,90)p
set(14,14700,24550,-90)pt
set(10,14700,20000,180)
chk(40,14700,21500,0)
set(10,14700,14400,0)p
set(10,14700,8800,0)p
set(32,14400,8000,180)pr
set(23,14700,6000,0)p
set(32,14300,12000,180)
set(32,15100,10000,180)
set(32,15000,6000,180)
set(23,14700,-2800,180)p
set(14,14700,-4550,180)pt
set(10,10150,-4550,-90)
chk(40,10150,-4550,90)
set(10,4550,-4550,90)p
set(14,0,-4550,90)pt


maxl(8,-4000,-5000)
maxt(6,31000,-1600)
maxr(8,24800,-5000)
maxb(6,-7400,-1600)
